name: Honey Defense
description:
The first project from the University of Missouri Kansas City  Gamedev team, made for the 32-bit jam

Place beehives as a defense to stop the bears marching towards your honey

Gameplay notes:

Placing a tower costs $75

If any bear reaches the honey at the end, you instantly lose and the game will close

3rd party Assets

Thanks to JustCreate for their free Low-Poly simple nature pack that we used in this project.  

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/landscapes/low-poly-simple...
